fireDialogHeaderNoTabs.title: Clear Data
fireDialogHeaderNoTabs.note: Dialog header when tab clearing is disabled.

optionCurrentSite.title: Current site only
optionCurrentSite.note: Dropdown option to only clear data for the current active website

optionLastHour.title: Last hour
optionLastHour.note: Dropdown option to only clear data from the last hour

optionLast24Hour.title: Last 24 hours
optionLast24Hour.note: Dropdown option to only clear data from the last 24 hours

optionLast7days.title: Last 7 days
optionLast7days.note: Dropdown option to only clear data from the last 7 days

optionLast4Weeks.title: Last 4 weeks
optionLast4Weeks.note: Dropdown option to only clear data from the last 4 weeks

optionAllTime.title: All time
optionAllTime.note: Dropdown option to clear all data

historyDuration.title: {duration, select, hour {one hour} day {24 hours} week {one week} month {4 weeks} other {all} }
historyDuration.note: Description of what period of history data should be deleted.

summaryClearTabsHistoryDuration.title: Close {openTabs} {openTabs, plural, =1 {tab} other {tabs}}, and clear {durationDesc} of browsing history and cookies?
summaryClearTabsHistoryDuration.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form

summaryClearTabsDuration.title: Close {openTabs} {openTabs, plural, =1 {tab} other {tabs}}, and clear {durationDesc} of cookies?
summaryClearTabsDuration.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form

summaryClearHistoryDuration.title: Clear {durationDesc} of browsing history and cookies?
summaryClearHistoryDuration.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form

summaryClearCookiesDuration.title: Clear {durationDesc} of cookies?
summaryClearCookiesDuration.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form

summaryClearTabsHistoryAll.title: Close {openTabs} {openTabs, plural, =1 {tab} other {tabs}}, and clear all browsing history and cookies ({cookies} {cookies, plural, =1 {site} other {sites}})?
summaryClearTabsHistoryAll.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form

summaryClearTabsAll.title: Close {openTabs} {openTabs, plural, =1 {tab} other {tabs}}, and clear all cookies ({cookies} {cookies, plural, =1 {site} other {sites}})?
summaryClearTabsAll.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form

summaryClearHistoryAll.title: Clear all browsing history and cookies ({cookies} {cookies, plural, =1 {site} other {sites}})?
summaryClearHistoryAll.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form

summaryClearCookiesAll.title: Clear all cookies ({cookies} {cookies, plural, =1 {site} other {sites}})?
summaryClearCookiesAll.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form

summaryClearTabsHistorySite.title: Close {openTabs} {site} {openTabs, plural, =1 {tab} other {tabs}}, and clear all {site} cookies?
summaryClearTabsHistorySite.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form

summaryClearTabsSite.title: Close {openTabs} {site} {openTabs, plural, =1 {tab} other {tabs}}, and clear all {site} cookies?
summaryClearTabsSite.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form

summaryClearHistorySite.title: Clear all {site} browsing history and cookies?
summaryClearHistorySite.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form

summaryClearCookiesSite.title: Clear all {site} cookies?
summaryClearCookiesSite.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form

summaryPinnedIgnored.title: {tabs} pinned {tabs, plural, =1 {tab} other {tabs}} will be ignored.
summaryPinnedIgnored.note: Notice to tell the user that some tabs will not be closed.

clearData.title: Clear
clearData.note: Button text to start data clearing.

cancel.title: Cancel
cancel.note: Button text to exit the fire button modal

historyAndDownloadsNotAffected.title: To also clear history, select a time period.
historyAndDownloadsNotAffected.note: Notice to tell the user that the chosen clearing settings will not affect history and downloads.
